Original title: Saving Mr. Banks
Year: 2013
Duration: 125 min.
Country: United States
Director: John Lee Hancock
Screenplay: Sue Smith , Kelly Marcel
Music: Thomas Newman
Photography: John Schwartzman
Cast : Emma Thompson, Tom Hanks, Colin Farrell, Paul Giamatti, Jason Schwartzman, Bradley Whitford, Ruth Wilson, BJ Novak, Rachel Griffiths, Kathy Baker
Studio: Walt Disney Pictures / Ruby Films / Essential Media & Entertainment
Genre: Drama | Film In Film . Literature . Based on a true story. 60s. Childhood
Official Website: http://movies.disney.com/saving-mr-banks

Synopsis:
---------
For fourteen years, Walt Disney (Tom Hanks) tries tirelessly to Australian writer PL Travers (Emma Thompson) ceded the film rights to his first and most popular novel,'Mary Poppins', which was finally brought to the big screen in 1964.

Awards:
-------
2013: Oscar: Nominated for Best Soundtrack
2013: Golden Globes: Nominated Best Actress (Thompson)
2013: BAFTA Awards: 4 nominations, including Best British Film
2013: Critics Choice: 4 nominations, including Best Picture
2013: National Board of Review (NBR): Top 10 and Best Actress (Thompson)
2013: American Film Institute: Top 10 - Best Films of the Year
2013: Satellite Awards: 6 nominations, including Best Picture and Actress (Thompson)
